alert.note: Alert for La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County West of Continental Divide Below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 11:19AM MST until January 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Additional snow accumulations of one to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...La Garita Mountains above 10000 feet, and Saguache County west of Continental Divide below 10000 feet. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy and snow packed roads. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County West of Continental Divide Below 10000 Ft
